mapper.select: SELECT tr.tid,tr.uid,tr.pid,tr.tpid,tr.submit_id,j.status,j.score,j.time as use_time, u.gender,u.realname as realname,u.username,u.avatar,u.school,u.nickname FROM training_record tr,user_info u,judge j WHERE tr.uid = u.uuid AND tr.submit_id = j.submit_id AND tr.tid = #{tid} AND j.status IN (-3,-2,-1,0,1,2,3,8) ORDER BY j.gmt_create ASC
